item.title: Automatically construct / infer / sense bigquery schema
item.description: Update: BigQuery adds schema auto-detection (2019-06-22) BigQuery now offers a schema auto-detection features making the work I had done below no longer necessary. Original Post BigQuery is a phenomenal tool for analyzing large datasets. It enables you to upload large datasets and perform sophisticated SQL queries on millions of rows in seconds. Moreover, it can be integrated with R using BigRQuery, which can be used to interact with bigquery using some of the functions in dplyr.
